Name: TransformFaceTicoBabyDemoObj
Notes: Creates and registers the Young Master Luma model that appears during the cutscene where Starship Mario gets created. Young Master Luma's model will be registered under the name ベビチコ[顔惑星変化用]. The model will be hidden unless requested to appear through the cutscene.

DemoCast.Description: The cutscene that it belongs to. Expected to be called マリオ顔惑星変化.
